CustomField.formula: IF(ff_Merchant_Type__c =='Single Line Expense','SLE'+';'+Account__c +';'+ Deal__c +';'+ Departure_Date__c+';'+Component__c, IF(ff_Merchant_Type__c =='Multi Line Expense', 'MLE'+';'+Account__c, 'Populate Merchant Type') )+';'+IF( TEXT(Entity__c)='Trip A Deal Pty Limited' ,'TADCompany', 'TNZCompany')
CustomField.label: DT archetype
